mapper.sql: select tr.record_id, tr.user_id, tr.record_time, tr.record_type, tr.buy_id, tr.sale_id, tr.recharge_id, tr.record_amount, tr.user_remain_amount, CASE WHEN tr.record_type = '0' OR tr.record_type = '2' OR tr.record_type = '4' OR tr.record_type = '5' OR tr.record_type = '6' OR tr.record_type = '7' OR tr.record_type = '8' THEN tr.record_amount WHEN tr.record_type = '1' OR tr.record_type = '3' THEN tr.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END AS show_record_amount, tr.STATUS, tr.create_by, tr.create_time, tr.update_by, tr.update_time, tr.remark, d.dict_label as record_type_name, u.nick_name AS user_nick_name from sys_transaction_record tr left join sys_dict_data d on d.dict_type = 'transaction_record_type' and d.dict_value = tr.record_type INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = tr.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept de ON u.dept_id = de.dept_id
mapper.insert: insert into sys_transaction_record( user_id, record_type, buy_id, sale_id, recharge_id, record_amount, user_remain_amount, status, create_by, remark, record_time, create_time )values( #{userId}, #{recordType}, #{buyId}, #{saleId}, #{rechargeId}, #{recordAmount}, #{userRemainAmount}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{remark}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.delete:
delete from sys_transaction_record where record_id in
#{recordId}
mapper.select:
select r.record_id , r.user_id , r.record_time , r.record_type , r.buy_id , r.sale_id , r.recharge_id , r.record_amount , case when r.record_type = '1' and s.`status` = '1' then s.remain_amount else 0 end as sale_remain_amount , r.user_remain_amount , r.status from sys_transaction_record r left join sys_sale_coin s on s.sale_id = r.sale_id where r.user_id = #{userId}
AND
(r.record_type = #{dictCode})
and date_format(r.record_time,'%y%m%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{recordTimeFrom}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(r.record_time,'%y%m%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{recordTimeTo}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and r.status = '0' order by r.record_time DESC
limit #{pageNumber} , #{pageRowCount}

SELECT tr.user_id, MAX( u.nick_name ) AS user_nick_name, SUM( CASE WHEN tr.record_type = '0' OR tr.record_type = '2' OR tr.record_type = '4' OR tr.record_type = '5' OR tr.record_type = '6' OR tr.record_type = '7' OR tr.record_type = '8' THEN tr.record_amount WHEN tr.record_type = '1' OR tr.record_type = '3' THEN tr.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS record_amount FROM sys_transaction_record tr INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = tr.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE tr.STATUS = '0'
and tr.user_id = #{userId}
and ( u.user_id = 1 or d.dept_id IN ( SELECT dept_id FROM sys_dept WHERE find_in_set( #{deptId} , ancestors ) ) )
and date_format(tr.record_time,'%y%m%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and date_format(tr.record_time,'%y%m%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
and tr.record_type = #{recordType}
GROUP BY tr.user_id

SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN tr.record_type = '0' OR tr.record_type = '2' OR tr.record_type = '4' OR tr.record_type = '5' OR tr.record_type = '6' OR tr.record_type = '7' OR tr.record_type = '8' THEN tr.record_amount WHEN tr.record_type = '1' OR tr.record_type = '3' THEN tr.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS record_amount FROM sys_transaction_record tr INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = tr.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id WHERE tr.STATUS = '0'
and ( u.user_id = 1 or d.dept_id IN ( SELECT dept_id FROM sys_dept WHERE find_in_set( #{deptId} , ancestors ) ) )
and tr.user_id = #{userId}
and date_format(tr.record_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(sysdate(),'%y%m%d') and date_format(tr.record_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(sysdate(),'%y%m%d')
and date_format(tr.record_time,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(sysdate() - INTERVAL 1 DAY,'%y%m%d') and date_format(tr.record_time,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(sysdate() - INTERVAL 1 DAY,'%y%m%d')
GROUP BY tr.user_id

-- SELECT -- FROM -- ( SELECT tr_temp1.user_id AS user_id ,u.nick_name AS nick_name ,u.user_type AS user_type ,IFNULL(tr_temp1.transaction_total_amount,0) AS transaction_total_amount ,IFNULL(tr_temp1.transaction_buy_amount,0) AS transaction_buy_amount ,IFNULL(tr_temp1.transaction_sale_amount,0) AS transaction_sale_amount FROM ( SELECT tr1.user_id ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr1.record_type = '0' OR tr1.record_type = '1' THEN tr1.record_amount WHEN tr1.record_type = '7' THEN tr1.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_total_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr1.record_type = '0' THEN tr1.record_amount ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_buy_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr1.record_type = '1' THEN tr1.record_amount WHEN tr1.record_type = '7' THEN tr1.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_sale_amount FROM sys_transaction_record tr1 WHERE tr1.STATUS = '0' AND tr1.record_type in('0','1','7')

GROUP BY tr1.user_id )tr_temp1 INNER JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_id = tr_temp1.user_id WHERE 1 = 1

UNION ALL SELECT u.user_id AS user_id ,u.nick_name AS nick_name ,u.user_type AS user_type ,IFNULL(tr_temp1.transaction_total_amount,0) + IFNULL(tr_temp2.transaction_total_amount,0) + IFNULL(tr_temp3.transaction_total_amount,0) AS transaction_total_amount ,IFNULL(tr_temp1.transaction_buy_amount,0) + IFNULL(tr_temp2.transaction_buy_amount,0) + IFNULL(tr_temp3.transaction_buy_amount,0) AS transaction_buy_amount ,IFNULL(tr_temp1.transaction_sale_amount,0) + IFNULL(tr_temp2.transaction_sale_amount,0) + IFNULL(tr_temp3.transaction_sale_amount,0) AS transaction_sale_amount FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tr1.user_id ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr1.record_type = '0' OR tr1.record_type = '1' THEN tr1.record_amount WHEN tr1.record_type = '7' THEN tr1.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_total_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr1.record_type = '0' THEN tr1.record_amount ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_buy_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr1.record_type = '1' THEN tr1.record_amount WHEN tr1.record_type = '7' THEN tr1.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_sale_amount FROM sys_transaction_record tr1 WHERE tr1.STATUS = '0' AND tr1.record_type in('0','1','7')
AND date_format(tr1.record_time,'%y%m%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(tr1.record_time,'%y%m%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY tr1.user_id )tr_temp1 ON u.user_id = tr_temp1.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.dept_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT u2.parent_user_id ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr2.record_type = '0' OR tr2.record_type = '1' THEN tr2.record_amount WHEN tr2.record_type = '7' THEN tr2.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_total_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr2.record_type = '0' THEN tr2.record_amount ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_buy_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr2.record_type = '1' THEN tr2.record_amount WHEN tr2.record_type = '7' THEN tr2.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_sale_amount FROM sys_transaction_record tr2 INNER JOIN sys_user u2 ON u2.user_id = tr2.user_id WHERE tr2.STATUS = '0' AND tr2.record_type in('0','1','7')
AND date_format(tr2.record_time,'%y%m%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(tr2.record_time,'%y%m%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY u2.parent_user_id )tr_temp2 ON tr_temp2.parent_user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT u4.parent_user_id ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr3.record_type = '0' OR tr3.record_type = '1' THEN tr3.record_amount WHEN tr3.record_type = '7' THEN tr3.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_total_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr3.record_type = '0' THEN tr3.record_amount ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_buy_amount ,SUM( CASE WHEN tr3.record_type = '1' THEN tr3.record_amount WHEN tr3.record_type = '7' THEN tr3.record_amount *- 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS transaction_sale_amount FROM sys_transaction_record tr3 INNER JOIN sys_user u3 ON u3.user_id = tr3.user_id INNER JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.user_id = u3.parent_user_id WHERE tr3.STATUS = '0' AND tr3.record_type in('0','1','7') AND u3.user_type = '04'
AND date_format(tr3.record_time,'%y%m%d') >= STR_TO_DATE(#{startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND date_format(tr3.record_time,'%y%m%d') <= STR_TO_DATE(#{endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d')
GROUP BY u4.parent_user_id )tr_temp3 ON tr_temp3.parent_user_id = u.user_id WHERE 1 = 1
AND u.user_id = #{userId}
AND u.parent_user_id = #{parentUserId}
AND ( u.user_id = 1 or d.dept_id IN ( SELECT dept_id FROM sys_dept WHERE find_in_set( #{deptId} , ancestors ) ) )
AND u.user_type = #{userType}
